/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, providing a stark contrast to the urban buildings that rise in the background. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, stand tall against the clear blue sky. A few clouds are scattered across the sky, adding depth to the panoramic view. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
